topic.title: How to use another browser?
topic.body: How to automatically launch a specific browser after launching ZeroNet?

1604067141_mirrored_kiridu1988_github.body:
Thanks for the help, developers!
You don't even know your own program. :(

You did not answer my question.
And everything that you said, I already know.

https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet-win
Where is the source code of the exe file for Windows?

https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet-mac
Where is the source code of the exe file for Mac?
Why is everything so unorganized?

What is the direct link to the sorce code of exe file?
I do not need Chrome, I want to specify the relative path to the browser.

ZeroNet.exe?

I created a shortcut and added
--open_browser=C:\Users\user\Desktop\znbrowser\FirefoxPortableWin\FirefoxPortable.exe "%s"

but it does not work.
So how to solve this problem?

[global]
open_browser=C:\Users\user\Desktop\znbrowser\FirefoxPortableWin\FirefoxPortable.exe "%s"

The browser does not start, only ZeroNet.

I removed "%s".
Only ZeoNet was launched, but not the browser.
Probably there are bugs that need to be fixed.
I'll wait a couple of years when it starts working.
